Articles.Content: So recently I got my unmanned ship within less than 50 meters of the kerman I was supposed to rescue, however I can switch to nor can I "fly" from the tracking station. Only options available to me is to terminate or to stop tracking. I have flown him before though.
Just to clarify, the [ and ] keys don't work? Even though you're within 50m?

Never knew about the [ and] keys...they fixed the problem, but what I was trying to do was control the kerman via either directly switching to him by going to the orbital map and doing it that way or to go to the tracking station and select "fly", which was greyed out.

thanks for the help.
